Date: Thursday, 5/1/1990
Subject: Status of Hector Pedraza
Dear Sir,
Hector Pedraza has an AVG of .213 at AA Margate Bridges!
That's definitely no good sign. I suggest demoting him soon.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Dear Sir,

He has an AVG of .278 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
